title: User Profile Page
description: Add a user profile page where users can view and edit their profile information
user_stories: As a user, I want to view my profile information so I can see my account details
As a user, I want to edit my profile so I can update my information
As a user, I want to upload a profile picture so I can personalize my account
non_functional_requirements: Form should validate inputs before submission
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
initial_acceptance_criteria: AC1: User can navigate to profile page from main menu
AC2: Profile page displays user name, email, and bio
AC3: User can edit profile fields inline
AC4: User can upload profile picture
AC5: Changes are saved via API call
